casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Taylor.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Taylor (1997), 78 Ohio St.3d 312.]

(No. 96-2479 Submitted January 22, 1997 Decided April 30, 1997.) *315Geoffrey Stem, Disciplinary Counsel, and Loñ J. Brown, Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. James M. McCord, for respondent. Per Curiam.

On review of the record, we adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby suspended from the practice of law for one year. Costs are taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Lundberg Stratton, J., not participating.
